sub_title: Finance Master student at ESADE. Cum laude graduate in International Business Administration at Rotterdam School of Management. Student consultant.
summary:
I am a meticulous and detail-oriented individual with a strong passion for finance, particularly in sectors such as investment banking, private equity, investment funds, and real estate. My academic journey includes graduating with honors in International Business Administration from the Rotterdam School of Management at Erasmus University in Rotterdam. To further enhance my expertise in finance, I am currently pursuing ESADE's MSc in Finance program.

Collaboration and teamwork are integral to my work ethic, and I thrive in group settings where diverse perspectives come together to achieve common goals. Currently, I am working as a student consultant with Kepsfield, where I apply my knowledge to create online learning solutions for corporate finance courses.

Beyond academics and professional pursuits, I have a well-rounded lifestyle. I enjoy spending my free time at the gym, focusing on personal fitness, and maintaining an active and healthy lifestyle. Being friendly, social, and outgoing, I cherish spending quality time with my friends, engaging in meaningful conversations, and building lasting connections.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.description:
As a student consultant at Kepsfiled, I am involved in the creation of online learning solutions for corporate finance-related courses.My tasks include comprehensively summarising theory, writing calculation examples, creating content and calculation questions for students, and preparing a public company case.The last steps include company analysis, industry and market research, and the development of financial models (such as Discounted Cash Flow or Comparable Trading Analysis).

Additionally, I help in reviewing and presenting business valuations of various M&A deals and impairment assessments.

Key achievements:
- Developed a corporate finance course Introduction to Valuation
- Developed a corporate finance course Introduction to Relative Valuation
- Developed a full DCF model for a public Duch telecom company to integrate in the valuation course.
profile_positions.title: Student Consultant

company.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

profile_positions.company: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University
profile_positions.description:
As an IBA ambassador at the Rotterdam School of Management, I was responsible for contacting and assisting prospective and incoming students. I have aided future students by helping them understand the workings of a University and the IBA course, as well as offering them support in their search for accommodation and handling of legal and practical matters before coming to study in Rotterdam. I have communicated with the students via texting (WhatsApp or the university's UniBuddy app) as well as in person or over video calls.

Additionally, I organized and led multiple campus tours where prospective students and their families were taken around the Erasmus campus and answered any questions about the student experience.

Lastly, I prepared various course-related presentations which I presented together with my colleagues at both online and offline events such as RSM's open days.

Key achievements:
- Effectively helped over 100 students in their transition to the Erasmus University
- Successfully represented RSM and Erasmus University at 2 bachelor open days
- Organized and led over 20 campus tours for prospective students
profile_positions.title: Student Ambassador
